ingredients: 4 large cloves fresh garlic, peeled and sliced,   +   1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, or other course-grain salt, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, or more to taste,   +   1/2 cup light, extra-virgin olive oil, 1 teaspoon water to adjust texture, or more as needed
